content.speaker: Unknown
content.text:
Under clause 3 of rule XII,

       158. The SPEAKER presented a memorial of the General 
     Assembly of the Commonwealth of Virginia, relative to House 
     Joint Resolution No. 1 and Senate Joint Resolution No. 1, 
     submitting Virginia's ratification of the Equal Rights 
     Amendment to the Constitution of the United States; which was 
     referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
